name: Telegram Image Upload Bot
description: A bot to Upload Telegram Images to Telegraph by @AbirHasan2005

SESSION_NAME.description: Any Name of Bot Session. Can Keep This Default.

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Any Telegram Channel Username for Force Sub.

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB URL with Username & Password. If need help ask in @linux_repo !!

ADMIN.description: UserID of Bot Owner. This for using Broadcast Command.

HOME_MSG.description: Start Command Text of Bot. Better keep this Default.

ABOUT_MSG.description: About Bot Text. Please Keep this Default!
